participant_1.background: i attend church every week. i have a dogs. i work as a school teacher. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors.

participant_2.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've never been out of ohio. i have a cat named spook. my favorite band is the who.

content.text: In High School, even a family holiday can inspire gossip.
